anya-e0401n4:43_63: karoti. “Paṭibimbacchāyā”ti pasannesu ādāsapaṭṭesuvā udakesuvā uppannā sarīracchāyā.
anya-e0401n4:43_64: Etehi nidassanehi phalaṁ nāma hetuto āgataṁ na hoti. Hetunā ca vinā na sijjhatīti
anya-e0401n4:43_65: ettakamatthaṁ dīpeti. “Bījasaṅkhāro”ti kālantare uppannesu pupphaphalesu icchitavaṇṇa
anya-e0401n4:43_67: paribhāvanā. Tattha tappaccayā kālantare pupphaphalesu uppannesu tevaṇṇagandharasā
anya-e0401n4:43_68: pātubbhavanti. “Pāṭibhogo”ti kiñci atthaṁ sādhetuṁ parassa santike iṇaṁ gaṇhantassa
anya-e0401n4:43_69: tavadhanaṁ saṁvaccharena vuḍḍhiyā saha dassāmi, sace nadadeyyaṁ. Asukaṁ nāma mamakhettaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_70: vā vatthuvā tuyhaṁ hotūti paṭiññāṭhapanaṁ. Tattha tappaccayā dhanaṁ labhitvā taṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_71: atthañca sādheti. Kāle sampatte vuḍḍhiyā saha iṇañca sodheti. “Vijjāsipposadhā”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_72: loke puttake yāvajīvaṁ hitatthāya daharakāle kiñci vijjaṁvā sippaṁvā sikkhāpenti.
anya-e0401n4:43_73: Yāvajīvaṁ khararogānaṁ anuppādatthāya daharakāle ojavantaṁ kiñci osadhaṁ vā ajjhohārenti.
anya-e0401n4:43_74: Tattha tappaccayā puttānaṁ yāvajīvaṁ hitappaṭilābho vā tādisānaṁ rogānaṁ anuppādo
anya-e0401n4:43_75: vā hotiyeva. Etehi yathā kālantare asantesuyeva pāṭibhogādīsu mūlakammesu pubbabhāge
anya-e0401n4:43_76: katapaccayā eva pacchā attha sādhanādīni sijjhanti. Tathā kusalā kusala kammāni katvā
anya-e0401n4:43_77: kālantare tesu asantesupi pubbe katattā eva pacchā paṭisandhādīni phalāni pātubbhavantīti
anya-e0401n4:43_79: tadā jīvitindriyassa dubbalattā kammampi dubbalameva hotīti katvā vuttaṁ. Kāmañcettha
anya-e0401n4:43_80: aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vatvā dassitaṁ, tathāpi sambhavatīti sambandho. Tattha “taṁ pī”ti gatinimittampi.
anya-e0401n4:43_82: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṁ. Gāthāyaṁ. Pañcadvāre paṭisandhikammaṁ vinā dvigocare
anya-e0401n4:43_83: siyāti yojanā. Tattha “dvigocare”ti kammanimitta gatinimittabhūte dvigocare. Tattha
anya-e0401n4:43_84: pañcadvāre paṭisandhi nāma pañcadvārika maraṇāsanna vīthicittānaṁ ante ca vantānaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_85: paṭisandhi. Sāpi gatinimittabhūte gocare siyāti vutte pañcadvārika vīthicittāni pañcārammaṇabhūtāni
anya-e0401n4:43_86: gatinimittāni ārammaṇaṁ karontītipi siddhaṁ hoti. Evañca sati. Tesaṁ vīthicittānaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_87: ante acavitvā tadanubandhaka manodvārikavīthicittehipi kadāci kesañci ca vanaṁ nanasambhavatīti
anya-e0401n4:43_88: sakkā vattuṁ. Tesu pana anubandhaka vīthīsu atītaggahaṇa samudāyaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_89: atītānipi gatinimittāni labbhanti. Vatthuggahaṇanāmaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṁ dhammā
anya-e0401n4:43_90: rammaṇaṁpi labbhatiyeva. Tasmā yaṁ vuttaṁ ācariyena kāmāvacara paṭisandhiyā cha dvāraggahitaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_91: kammanimittaṁ gatinimittañca paccuppannamatītā rammaṇaṁ upalabbhatīti. Taṁ suvuttamevāti
anya-e0401n4:43_92: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yaṁ pana ‘tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇaṁ ārabbha cittasantānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_93: pavattatī’ti evaṁ antimavīthito pubbabhāge bahūnaṁ vīthivārānaṁ pavattanaṁ ācariyena
anya-e0401n4:43_94: vuttaṁ. Taṁ tathopaṭṭhitaṁ gatinimittaṁ ārabbhātipi laddhuṁ vaṭṭatiyeva. Evañcasati,
anya-e0401n4:43_95: gatinimittaṁpi atītaṁ labbhatīti dassetuṁ “yadāpanā”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Santati vasenā”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_96: santati paccuppanna vasena. “Tassā”ti gatinimittassa. Yebhūyyena vutto, na sabbasaṅgāhikena
anya-e0401n4:43_97: vuttoti adhippāyo. “Manodvārika maraṇāsanna javanānaṁpi icchitabbattā”ti purejātapaccaya
anya-e0401n4:43_98: bhāvena icchitabbattāti adhippāyo. “Tadanubandhāyā”ti tāni manodvāri kamaraṇāsanna
anya-e0401n4:43_99: javanāni anugatāya. “Paṭisandhiyāpi sambhavato”ti tassa purejāta paccayassa paṭisandhiyāpi
anya-e0401n4:43_100: purejāta paccayatā sambhavato. Nanu therena bhinditvā avuttepi bhinditabbe sati,
anya-e0401n4:43_101: bhindanameva yuttanti ce. Na yuttaṁ. Kasmā, kammanimittena samānagatikattā. Tenāha
anya-e0401n4:43_102: “nacataṁ”tiādiṁ. Vibhāvaniyaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbaṁti vatvā aparepana avisesatova
anya-e0401n4:43_103: vaṇṇentīti aparevādopi vutto. Tattha “avisesato vaṇṇentī”ti abhinditvāva vaṇṇentīti
anya-e0401n4:43_104: vuttaṁ hoti. Puna taṁ aparevādaṁ asampaṭicchanto “aṭṭhakathāyaṁ panā”tiādimāha. Idha
anya-e0401n4:43_105: pana taṁ aparevādaṁ paggaṇhanto puna “yañca tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha “tadārammaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_106: taṁ gatinimittā rammaṇāya. “Tesaṁ vacanaṁ”ti aparesaṁ vacanaṁ. “Aññatra avicāraṇāyā”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_107: kasmā vuttaṁ. Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṁ panātiādi sabbaṁ vicāraṇā vacanameva hotīti. Saccaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_108: yathā diṭṭhapāṭhavasena, sāvasesa pāṭhabhāvaṁ pana na vicāretiyeva. Tasmā “aññatra
anya-e0401n4:43_109: avicāraṇāyā”ti vuttaṁ. Ettha siyā. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭho sāvaseso hotu, mūlaṭīkāpāṭho pana
anya-e0401n4:43_110: manodvāre yevāti niyametvā vuttattā kathaṁ sāvaseso siyāti. Niyametvā vuttopi idha
anya-e0401n4:43_111: adhippetatthe aparipuṇṇe sāvaseso eva hotīti. Tena vuttaṁ “aññaṁ kāraṇaṁ natthi aññatra
anya-e0401n4:43_113: ca vanaṁ hotīti yojanā. Evaṁ aparatthapi. Balavantepi sati. Tadārammaṇāvasānāya eva
anya-e0401n4:43_114: vīthiyā. “Vuttattā panā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ eva vuttattā pana. “Purimabhāge evā”ti pañcadvārika
anya-e0401n4:43_115: antima vīthito pubbabhāge eva. “Tāhī”ti deyyadhammavatthūhi. “Yathātaṁ”ti taṁ atthajātaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_116: katamaṁ viyāti attho. “Ito”ti manussa bhavato. Nimitta sadisaṁ saddaṁ vaṇṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n4:43_117: “Naṭṭhacakāraṁ”ti patitacakāraṁ. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe ñātakā mātādayo pañcadvāre upasaṁharantīti
anya-e0401n4:43_119: pavatto paṭo cīnapaṭo. Tathā somārapaṭepi. “Tānī”ti rasaphoṭṭhabbāni. Phoṭṭhabbaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_120: pana aññaṁpi yujjateva. Atthidānīti manasikatattā paccuppannabhūtānīti vuttaṁ. “Arūpīnaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_122: yesaṁ te vissaṭṭhajjhānā. “Tatoyeva cā”ti vissaṭṭhajjhānattāyeva ca. Ākaḍḍhitaṁ mānasaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_123: cittaṁ etesanti viggaho. Idañca hetuvisesana padaṁ. Ākaḍḍhitamānasattā kāmabhave
anya-e0401n4:43_124: uppajjamānānanti dīpeti. Tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ. “Aññaṁ dubbala kammaṁ”ti upacārajjhānakammato
anya-e0401n4:43_125: aññaṁ tihetukomakaṁ kammaṁ. “Tesaṁ”ti rūpalokato ca vantānaṁ. “Sato”ti santassa samānassa.
anya-e0401n4:43_126: “Upatthambhane kāraṇaṁ natthī”ti idaṁ upacārajjhāna kammassa garuka kammagatikattā
anya-e0401n4:43_127: vuttaṁ. Ekanta garukakammabhūtaṁpi pana mahaggatajjhāna kammaṁ nāma nānānikanti balena
anya-e0401n4:43_128: paṭibāhīyamānaṁ paṭisandhiṁ na detiyeva. Upacārajjhāna kamme vattabbaṁ natthīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n4:43_129: “Tādisānī”ti tathā rūpāni dvihetukomaka kammāni tesaṁ okāsaṁ na labhanti. Nīvaraṇānaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_131: pī”ti upacārajjhāna kammato aññāni paccuppanna kammānipi atītabhavesu katāni aparapariyāya
anya-e0401n4:43_132: kammānipi. “Yena cā”ti yena nānākammānampi okāsa lābhakāraṇena ca. “Te”ti rūpī brahmāno.
anya-e0401n4:43_134: [ yasmā panātiādinā ca ] paribhāvita cittasantānattā’ti ca vuttanayeneva. “Taṁ kāraṇaṁ”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_135: ahetuka paṭisandhiyā abhāva kāraṇaṁ. Parampara bhavesuca vīthimuttacittānaṁ pavattākāraṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_136: dassetunti sambandho. “Yathā tāniyeva osadhānī”ti loke ekaṁ osadhaṁ labhitvātaṁ devasikaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_137: bhuñjati. Ekopathamadivase bhuñjantaṁ disvā katamaṁ nāma tvaṁ osadhaṁ bhuñjasīti
anya-e0401n4:43_138: pucchi. Idaṁ nāma osadhaṁ bhuñjāmīti vadati. Punadivasesupi osadhaṁ bhuñjantaṁ disvā
anya-e0401n4:43_139: tatheva pucchi. Tameva osadhaṁ bhuñjāmīti vadati. Tattha “tameva osadhaṁ”ti yaṁ pathamadivase
anya-e0401n4:43_140: osadhaṁ tayāca pucchitaṁ. Mayā ca kathitaṁ. Tameva ajja bhuñjāmīti attho. Tattha
anya-e0401n4:43_141: pana pathamadivase bhuttaṁ osadhaṁ aññaṁ. Ajja bhuttaṁ aññaṁ. Taṁsadisaṁ pana aññaṁpi
anya-e0401n4:43_142: tamevāti loke voharanti tāniyeva osadhāni bhuñjāmīti. Evaṁ idhapi tassadise tabbohāro
anya-e0401n4:43_143: daṭṭhabbo. “Tasmiṁ”ti bhavaṅgacitte. Avattamāne upapattibhavo occhijjati. Vattamāne
anya-e0401n4:43_144: na occhijjati. Tasmā tassa upapatti bhavassa anoccheda aṅgatthāya kāraṇattā bhavaṅganti
anya-e0401n4:43_145: vuccatīti adhippāyo. “Upapatti bhavo”ti ca kammajakkhandhasantānaṁ vuccati. “Parasamaye”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_146: uccheda diṭṭhīnaṁ vāde. “Vaṭṭamūlānī”ti avijjātaṇhā vuccanti. Vaṭṭamūlāni suṭṭhuucchijjanti
anya-e0401n4:43_147: etthāti viggaho. “Yassa atthāyā”ti saupādisesādikassa nibbānassa paṭilābhatthāya.
anya-e0401n4:43_148: “Paṭṭhapīyantī”ti pavattāpīyanti. Pajjanti pāpuṇanti ariyā janā etthāti padaṁ. Parato
anya-e0401n4:43_149: samantipade anupādisesassa gayhamānattā idha saupādisesanti vuttaṁ. Bujjhantīti budhā.
anya-e0401n4:43_150: Suṭṭhu saddhiṁ ucchinnaṁ sinehabandhanaṁ yehi te susamucchinnasinehabandhanā. Kathañca
anya-e0401n4:43_151: suṭṭhuucchinnaṁ, kehi ca saddhiṁ ucchinnantiāha “anusayamattaṁ pī”tiādiṁ. “Sesakilesehī”ti
anya-e0401n4:43_152: taṇhāsineha bandhanato avasesa kilesehi. “Adhisayitaṁ”ti vikkhambhituṁpi asakkuṇeyyaṁ
anya-e0401n4:43_153: hutvā atirekataraṁ sayitaṁ. “Adhigamāvahaṁ”ti adhigamo vuccati navavidho lokuttara
